abstract: JPMorgan Chase is facing fresh claims related to Bear Stearns. | You can have too much money, at least if you're a private equity firm. | The S.E.C. and high-frequency trading. | Bain Capital's offshore arrangements limited Romney's tax bill -- and increased his income.
